item.title: Stand
item.description: My name is Gabriel Voelcker and I am, among other things, an economist. I hope to use this netlify as a place to formalize my ideas, improve my coding skills and, last but not least, connect with other people who share interests with me.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
